events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
Case has been reviewed and categorized under Refund due to customer requesting money back.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund request case.
Hello! I’m Sarah, and I’m here to assist you with your refund request. Could you provide your order number please?
To process your refund quickly, may I please have a photo of the item you received and the order number?
Sure, the order number is 12345678. I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product that arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and refund confirmation. Looking forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund process has been completed on our side. Please contact us if you do not see the refund within 5 business days.
We wanted to check in and confirm that you received your refund without any issues. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Yes, the refund showed up in my account today. Thanks for your help resolving this quickly!
Since your issue has been resolved successfully, we are closing this support case now. Have a great day!
